[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2331053][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/notablethreads-mix.png[/img][/url][/align]
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=medium]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Announcements[/b][/color][/size][/font]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5976330][color=#FFFFFF]Official Goodwill Monday #10[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9999FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
On the third of this month, it was Hack Forums official goodwill Monday, this was the 10th edition and what a blast it was, Omniscient gave 10k bytes to a random member who donated a minimum of five bytes to anyone with the words "Happy Goodwill Monday" in the Donation.
[/list][font=Trebuchet MS][size=medium]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Informational Threads[/b][/color][/size][/font]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5975480][color=#FFFFFF]Do you have student debt in the USA?[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2682887][color=#ED1C24][b]Mr. Robot[/b][/color][/url]
Mr. Robot wants to know if you are on a student loan and if you going to be in debt?

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5976895][color=#FFFFFF]The Requirements System Explained[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3472449][color=#FFFFFF][b]Traum[/b][/color][/url]
Traum has made a very in-depth thread around what members, L33t's and Ub3r's get access to & what perks you get with your user group.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5976950][color=#FFFFFF]Danish Election. - Quran burnings[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=151894][color=#EC7E03][b]Deal[/b][/color][/url]
The member Deal has made a disscussion thread about the Danish election, go and have your say in the matters.
[/list][font=Trebuchet MS][size=medium]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Entertaining Threads[/b][/color][/size][/font]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5975435][color=#FFFFFF]Penny = Satoshi[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9999FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
Omniscient believes that one day a Satoshi will be worth a penny, what do you think?

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5975406][color=#FFFFFF]Did you buy Your Graphics Card Used or Brand new?[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2331053][color=#FFFFFF][b]Mix[/b][/color][/url]
When you buy computer components like a graphics card do you buy it used, or brand new? Let Mix know what you do.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5977580][color=#FFFFFF]Have you planned for your death?[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1999047][color=#99CCFF][b]Vitani[/b][/color][/url]
The thought of death isn't the greatest of things to think of, but what is your concept of death & do you have any plans towards it?
[/list][font=Trebuchet MS][size=medium]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Contests & Giveaways[/b][/color][/size][/font]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5975217][color=#FFFFFF][Samaritans] 5 Weeks | 5 Upgrades Contest[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1573817][color=#00cc66][b]Spaark[/b][/color][/url]
Spaark and BowmanBot are hosting a group giveaway under the name of Samaritans. They are giving away an upgrade to one lucky member for the next five weeks.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5975215][color=#FFFFFF][Sociopaths] >>>DIAMOND OF "Hell" AWARD CONTEST + MANY MORE (June)<<<[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3596958][color=#ED1C24][b]Hell[/b][/color][/url]
The member Hell is hosting a group giveaway under Sociopaths. He is giving away the Diamond Of Hell Award to one lucky winner, the winner also gets $15 worth of GFX by Quick. So if you are feeling lucky and want to get your hands on a free award then get over to hells thread and try your luck.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5976505][color=#FFFFFF][SOCIOPATHS OFFICIAL GIVEAWAY]LOTS OF BYTES+MORE[SOCIOPATHS][/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3604010][color=#ED1C24][b]secretachiever101[/b][/color][/url]
secretachiever101 is hosting a giveaway with a little twist, the giveaway has over 3000 bytes to give away and some nice graphics too. All you need to do is post at a certain post count on the thread to win the prize, And it goes all the way up to 200 plus posts, so everyone has a chance!
[/list]

[font=Trebuchet MS][size=medium]

   

[/size][/font]
[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2991200][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/gamingnews-crescent.png[/img][/url][/align]
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=medium]

[b][color=white]"Gaming Disorder" Is Now A Disease[/color][/b] 
The World Health Organization, a sector for the United Nations has added "Gaming Disorder" to its registry for the disease this past weekend. According to the World Health Organization, "Gaming Disorder" is recognized by a "pattern of persistent or recurrent gaming behavior" online or offline. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.gamespot.com/articles/gaming-disorder-is-a-disease-world-health-organiza/1100-6467163/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Google Is Shutting Down The Youtube Gaming App[/color][/b] 
As of May 30th, the YouTube Gaming app will be shut down. Viewers are suggested to view their favorite streamers through the regular YouTube app or the hub page. (https://www.youtube.com/gaming) The company recommends you merge your subscriptions and prepare for what is to come. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.gamespot.com/articles/google-discontinues-youtube-gaming-app/1100-6467185/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Call Of Duty Modern Warfare Announced[/color][/b] 
Call Of Duty Modern Warfare has been announced. The reboot of The Original Call Of Duty Modern warfare, also known as Call of Duty 4, has been announced with the release of a trailer. (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PE9EHQEowes) This will feature new returning characters, including Captain Price, and an all-new co-op play mode. Activision says it will not feature a season pass and they are hoping for cross-platform play. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.ign.com/videos/2019/05/30/call-of-duty-modern-warfare-reboot-announced]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Xbox Deodorant, Body Spray, And Shower Gel Have Been Announced[/color][/b] 
Microsoft has partnered with Lynx (also known as Axe)  to create a new fragrance called Lynx Xbox. The description of these products is interesting: "Lynx Xbox is a fresh scent of pulsing green citrus, featuring top notes of kaffir lime and winter lemon, aromatic herbal middle notes of mint and sage, and woody bottom notes of patchouli and clearwood. Containing a range of natural essential oils, the Xbox Lynx range comes with a sleek new look and features a body spray, deodorant, and shower gel."  Xbox Lynx will be launched in Grocery Stores and Pharmacies in New Zealand and Australia in July. No news yet for other parts of the world. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.gamespot.com/articles/what-does-xbox-smell-like-xbox-deodorant-body-spra/1100-6467339/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]All You Need To Know About Google Stadia[/color][/b] 
Google has finally shared details about their upcoming "Google Stadia" a cloud base game streaming platform. Stadia will first arrive in November 2019 as part of a special "Founder's Edition" for early  buyers, with the Stadia Base for everyone else following in 2020. Unlike other platforms, Stadia is a cloud-based gaming service, with games running remotely on dedicated servers while easily streaming to nearly any device that can support  The Google Chrome browser. The only physical hardware included in the Google Stadia is its controller, which uses Wi-Fi to connect directly to the remote data center running the game. The controller is selling for $69.  [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.gamespot.com/articles/google-stadia-games-price-release-date-founders-ed/1100-6467345/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Call Of Duty Modern Warfare Will Not Have Zombies[/color][/b] 
In the upcoming Call Of Duty: Modern Warfare, there will be Campaign, Multiplayer, but no Zombies. Keeping to the original Modern Warfare Modern theme, Campaign gameplay director Jacob Minkoff said in a new interview that the "out-there" nature of Zombies modes in previous games doesn't exactly fit with Infinity Ward's ambition of making a gritty, realistic game. "Because they focus on more of the stylized, graphic novel, super-hero experience, they can have the much more 'out there' different types of gameplay in their games," Minkoff told PlayStation Lifestyle when asked about why they will not do Zombies.  [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.gamespot.com/articles/call-of-duty-modern-warfare-doesnt-include-zombies/1100-6467307/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]
[/size][/font]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=682909][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/businessnews-bear.png[/img][/url][/align]
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=medium]

[b][color=white]President Trump Announces New Tariffs on Mexico[/color][/b]
The United States president Donald Trump announced new tariffs on Mexico to force the country to curb illegal immigration to the United States across the border. He announced that from June 10, 2019, a 5% tariff would be imposed on all goods imported from Mexico to the United States, and this tariff could further increase to 25% if the illegal immigration was not curbed. The stock markets worldwide fell due to threats of a new trade war. The automotive manufacturers in the United States are likely to be worst affected by the new tariffs since the auto parts and engines are worth $128 billion. Share prices of carmakers like Ford and Fiat Chrysler were worst affected. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.nytimes.com/2019/05/31/business/mexico-tariffs-donald-trump.html]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]China Overtakes India as the Fastest Growing Economy[/color][/b]
The statistics released by the Indian government indicated that the Indian economy has only grown by 5.8% in the first quarter of 2019. As a result, the indian economy which was the fastest growing economy in the world, is now lagging behind the Chinese economy for the first time in more than 18 months. The Chinese economy grew by 6.4% in the first quarter of 2019, regaining its status as the fastest growing large economy in the world. The indian economy is mainly based on domestic consumption, and the latest statistics show that the demand has reduced. This has increased the pressure on the Indian government to provide a stimulus to the economy. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.bbc.com/news/business-48478028]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Uber Announces a $1 Billion Loss[/color][/b]
Uber reported a $1 billion loss for the first quarter of 2019, after it announced its quarterly results for the first time since it was listed on the stock exchange. Uber's revenues increased by 20% to $3.1 billion and the number of users also increased to 93 million. However, the company incurred more expenses since there was more competition from rival companies offering similar services. The company had to spend money on recruiting new drivers and also for the UberEats , its food delivery service which is being established. The company plans to innovate further using other vehicles. The share prices of the company remained flat. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.wsj.com/articles/ubers-first-quarter-loss-tops-1-billion-11559246846]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

       
[/size][/font]
[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2890436][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/trends-pikachu.png[/img][/url][/align]
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=medium]

[b][color=white]Destroy All Humans! Video Game Remake[/color][/b] 
Man oh man was Destroy All Humans one of my most favorite video games of all time growing up, and from the looks of it THQ Nordic is working on a complete remake of the classic game we all love and know. IGN released a new video trailer for the game on their YouTube channel, and it was simply amazing. The Rammstein song "Ich Will" is featured in the trailer, great music choice by the way, it really appeals to most of the Destroy All Humans fan base, and goes very well with the trailer. The new game is to be released sometime in 2020. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y-1Q86252hg]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]New Epic Rap Battles of History: Ronald McDonald VS The Burger King[/color][/b] 
Epic Rap Battles of History is back at it again, this time they got Ronald McDonald VS The Burger King. Of course, like every other ERB video, the two characters would "compete" in a rap battle in which case they dis each other in a very funny and entertaining way. Some of these videos do have a few twists here and there, and this episode definitely has one. So instead of spoiling it here for you guys, just go check out the video for yourself. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_AjRR6c--Ak]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]New Pokémon Sword and Shield Trailer: Get Ready for Dynamax![/color][/b] 
The new Pokémon Sword and Shield trailer was released and it's showing off this all new feature they call "Dynamax." From the looks of it, Dynamax will ultra-size your Pokémon in battle, making them grow to an insanely massive version of themselves. In addition to this new monstrosity of a feature they added, you also see some brand new Pokémon from the new region; including the two legendaries for each game. One thing I'm looking forward to is Dynamaxing a Pikachu! [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p_dgvgpC8Nw]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Terminator: Dark Fate Official Teaser Trailer[/color][/b] 
Paramount Pictures has recently released a trailer for the new upcoming Terminator movie. Terminator: Dark Fate is the name of the new film. I've always liked the Terminator movies as they have been apart of my childhood, so I'm actually really excited about this one. The new film looks great and seems like it's going to be full of action, as it should be. I'm definitely looking forward to watching this as soon as it hits theaters. Arnold Schwarzenegger AKA T-800 and Linda Hamilton AKA Sarah Connor will be returning for this new Terminator movie which will be on the big screen this November. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jCyEX6u-Yhs]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Swamp Thing - New Series Trailer[/color][/b] 
The DC Universe is bringing us yet another extraordinary looking series, this time it's based on Len Wein and Bernie Wrightson's "Swamp Thing." The trailer looks promising, it looks like its going to be one hell of a show. The new trailer for this upcoming series is pretty dark, seems like it may be somewhat of a horror series; or at least that's what it looks like. I am definitely looking forward to checking out this new series once it's officially out. The show will currently only be available to watch on the DC Universe website, and a subscription is required in order to watch it. Swamp Thing premieres on May 31, 2019. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xVnHZ5SF1Jg]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Honest Trailers | Men in Black[/color][/b] 
A YouTube Channel by the name of "Screen Junkies" has uploaded a new "Honest Trailers" video on Men In Black. Honest Trailers is a series of trailers with funny commentary behind it. In this video it talks about all three movies, and the commentary is pretty funny. This "trailer" video is actually a very well put together humorous video. Watching this video did bring back a lot of good old memories from the time i first watched the Men in Black movies, i remember i was only a little boy when the first movie came out, and at the time it was one of my favorite movies ever. This video was not only funny as hell, but also very nostalgic. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0fRlIQsZPQE]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

   [/size][/font]
posts.subject: RE: Hack Forums News // Edition 437
